oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Experimental Farm Westmaas
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beside an integrated farm system the unit has an organic farm system (1.2 ha) with open field vegetables, representing the more extensive organic arable farms in the south-west of The Netherlands.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} Westmaas: Experimental Farm Westmaas. Facility Leader(s): unknown, , Wageningen University and Research Centre.
